data.message:
Hey Em, I absolutely love your music and I followed your career since day one. The albums you put out helped me get through some of the toughest times in my life and I thank you for that. Just to be clear, I am not a Trump supporter and did not vote for him...
That all being said; you just took a giant shit on a whole bunch of people that helped you get rich and famous. A whole lot of people that made you millions of dollars buying your albums and supporting you no matter what you said. Now you say F@&k You to all of them?! 
You’re entitled to your own beliefs and feelings but so are your millions of fans. How about showing them some respect.… F&@k You too!
#eminem #norespect #sickofit #freethinker #independent #humansunite #unity #politicalslop #begrateful #HipHopIsInAStateOf911

replies.message: Please tell me, when has he been respectful?
This is true but he’s always been respectful to his fans.

No he didn't! 
He said 'FUCK YOU' to the degenerates that still support a tyrant whose wounded this country far worse than we could have ever imagined! 
You're all so blinded by his little words and degenerate ego that you can't seem to dislodge your fucking head from the inside of his rectum! 
Get a fucking clue! 
You expect Mather's to keep his mouth shut about something he's passionate about? 
He's NOT YOUR FUCKING PUPPET! 
Back the fuck up off him!
people act like he hasn't been doing this his whole career 😂😂😂
